mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_feed_info (user_id, content, image_url, task_id, record_id, is_public, like_count, comment_count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{taskId}, #{recordId}, #{isPublic}, #{likeCount}, #{commentCount}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_feed_info WHERE is_public = TRUE ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE user_feed_info SET like_count = like_count + #{increment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE user_feed_info SET comment_count = comment_count + #{increment}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
